name: WingsWay Training Institute LLC
about: WingsWay Training Institute LLC is a globally recognized training center in Dubai, UAE, specializing in aviation, travel and tourism, supply chain, procurement, and logistics. Founded by senior industry professionals, we offer CILT, IATA, IFPSM, APS, CIPS, and CFM certified courses. Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced trainers provide blended learning options, including online, offline, and hybrid courses. We are approved by the Knowledge and Human Development Authority (KHDA) and the Dubai Department of Economy & Tourism (DET), and hold ISO 9001:2015 certification. Our commitment extends to career counseling, guaranteed internships, and exam preparation, ensuring our students are fully equipped for global success. Welcome aboard WingsWay Training Institute, your passport to a world of opportunities.
